intro: Vandenboschia colensoi, commonly known as the Colenso's vandeboschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly known as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and produces small, star-shaped flowers. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, adapting to harsh conditions with its water-storing tissues. Vandenboschia colensoi is often found in rocky soils and is a popular choice for xeriscaping due to its low water requirements.
